roleset.name: supervise, control, with a partner

example.name: Both args
example.text: Managing the bond issue is a group of investment banks headed by First Boston Corp. and co-managed [NONE-*] by Goldman , Sachs& Co. , Merrill Lynch Capital Markets , Morgan Stanley & Co. , and Salomon Brothers Inc .
example.arg: by Goldman , Sachs& Co. , Merrill Lynch Capital Markets , Morgan Stanley & Co. , and Salomon Brothers Inc
